ygData.subject: Total Takeover
ygData.msgSnippet: (I am retaking ALL of my Alliance characters back...yeess.  Double Punch is in his stealth mode cloaked, and hasn t opened fire on anyone yet, and Breakdown

Subject: Total Takeover
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

(I am retaking ALL of my Alliance characters back...yeess.  Double Punch is 
in his stealth mode cloaked, and hasn't opened fire on anyone yet, and 
Breakdown nor Hiss can fly)

Hiss/Pyro/Breakdown/Double 
Punch/Manterror/Scattershot/Punch/Bumblebee/Injector/Dark One/Scavenger:



Double Punch sees a charge go off twenty feet from him, cursing as he feels 
flames engulf him, his cloaking system still in tact.  Activating his comm. 
system, he sent a transmission to Zardus.  

"Zardus, this is Predacon Double Punch.  We are here to kill those Maximals.  
Not to engage your forces.  Especially your mentally ill ones." 

Double Punch saw Dinobot coming his way, being chased by Alliance members.  
Raising a pincher, he fired off a missile at Dinobot's chest.

---

Manterror fired off two ion disks at Prowl, half his back turned towards the 
direction Tavatron was coming, leaving him vunerable for attack. (Hint, hint)

---

Injector cursed, raising his stinger missile launcher, flying full speed at 
Prowl, firing off two stinger missiles at the flying feathered metallic 
monstrosity of Maximal propaganda, a single optic laser blast lashing out at 
the Maximal's left side.

---

Bumblebee cursed, shells digging into his chest plating, knocking him back a 
few feet in the air.  Raising both of his stinger missile launcher, he fired 
off two missiles down at Scavenger, two at Prowl.

---

Scattershot flew through the air, raising his automatic rifle, firing off 10 
explosive rounds at Prowl's back, putting the boosters to full, speeding him 
up, sending him rocketing towards Prowl.

---

Scavenger screamed, a missile going off a few feet to the left of him, 
another hitting behind him.  Swerving to the left, the blasts missed him.  

"Maybe...I better stick to ground warfare." he decided, continuing to go 
after Dinobot.

---

Breakdown cursed.  He needed to catch up, but if he went to artillery mode 
it'd be even slower.  Raising his rifle, he fired off a few pot shots at 
Dinobot.

---

Pyro ran after Tavatron, flame cannon set on flame thrower.  "Barbecued 
saurian, my absolute FAVE!"

---

Hiss chased after Dinobot, firing a single pot shot, in hopes of compromising 
Dinobot's courage, from his fusion cannon.  

---

Dark One slowly entered the CR room, seeing the six CR chambers, stumbling 
towards one, he finally reached it after a cycle, although it was only a 
minute, it felt like an eternity to the badly damaged robot.

Pressing a button, the hatch slid open, Dark One stepping in, collapsing into 
stasis lock, the CR chamber hatch sliding shut, repairs initiating.
